patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,121 +1,112 @@
-export { default } from "./LazyImage";// 导出主要组件
-export { default as LazyImage } from "./LazyImage";
-export { default as LazyImageEnhanced, type LazyImageEnhancedProps } from "./LazyImageEnhanced";
-
-// 导出 HOC
-export { withEnhancedFeatures, type EnhancedFeatureProps } from "./hoc/withEnhancedFeatures";
-export type { LazyImageProps, VirtualScrollOptions } from "./types";
-
-// 并发控制
-export {
-  setMaxConcurrency,
-  getMaxConcurrency
-} from "./utils/concurrency";
-
-// 导出 Hook 版本的工具
-export {
-  useScrollManager,
-  type ScrollState,
-  type ScrollManagerOptions,
-  type UseScrollManagerReturn
-} from "./hooks/useScrollManager";
-
-export {
-  useMemoryManager,
-  type ImageMemoryInfo,
-  type MemoryManagerOptions,
-  type UseMemoryManagerReturn
-} from "./hooks/useMemoryManager";
-
-export {
-  useEnhancedMemoryManager,
-  type EnhancedImageMemoryInfo,
-  type MemoryHistoryPoint,
-  type MemoryLeakDetection,
-  type AutoCleanupStrategy,
-  type EnhancedMemoryManagerOptions,
-  type UseEnhancedMemoryManagerReturn
-} from "./hooks/useEnhancedMemoryManager";
-
-export {
-  useImageCache,
-  type UseImageCacheReturn
-} from "./hooks/useImageCache";
-
-export {
-  useEnhancedImageCache,
-  type CacheOperation,
-  type CacheHitRateStats,
-  type CacheSizeDistribution,
-  type CacheCleanupHistory,
-  type IndexedDBStatus,
-  type CachePerformanceMetrics,
-  type SmartCacheStrategy,
-  type EnhancedImageCacheOptions,
-  type UseEnhancedImageCacheReturn
-} from "./hooks/useEnhancedImageCache";
-
-export {
-  useLQIPCache,
-  type LQIPCacheOptions,
-  type UseLQIPCacheReturn
-} from "./hooks/useLQIPCache";
-
-
-
-// 导出 Worker 相关功能
-export {
-  getLQIPWorkerPool,
-  resetLQIPWorkerPool,
-  type LQIPTask,
-  type LQIPResult,
-  type LQIPError,
-  type WorkerPoolOptions
-} from "./utils/lqipWorkerPool";
-
-export {
-  detectWorkerCapabilities,
-  getWorkerRecommendation,
-  getRecommendedWorkerConfig,
-  testWorkerFunctionality,
-  getWorkerStatusReport,
-  getWorkerPerformanceMonitor,
-  type WorkerCapabilities,
-  type WorkerRecommendation
-} from "./utils/workerDetection";
-
-
-
-// 导出共享功能
-export {
-  LazyImageErrorBoundary
-} from "./shared/components";
-
-export {
-  withRetry,
-  bustUrl,
-  requestIdleCallbackCompat,
-  getLQIPConcurrencyManager
-} from "./shared/utils";
-
-export {
-  DEFAULT_CONFIG,
-  PRIORITY_LEVELS,
-  LOADING_STATES,
-  LQIP_FORMATS
-} from "./shared/constants";
-
-// Hooks
-export { useEnhancedInView } from "./hooks/useEnhancedInView";
-
-export {
-  useImageDecode,
-  type UseImageDecodeOptions,
-  type UseImageDecodeResult
-} from "./hooks/useImageDecode";
-
-// 监控组件
-export {
-  MemoryCacheMonitor,
-  type MemoryCacheMonitorProps
-} from "./monitoring";
\ No newline at end of file
+export { default } from "./LazyImage"; // 导出主要组件
+export { default as LazyImage } from "./LazyImage";
+export {
+  default as LazyImageEnhanced,
+  type LazyImageEnhancedProps,
+} from "./LazyImageEnhanced";
+
+// 导出 HOC
+export {
+  withEnhancedFeatures,
+  type EnhancedFeatureProps,
+} from "./hoc/withEnhancedFeatures";
+export type { LazyImageProps, VirtualScrollOptions } from "./types";
+
+// 并发控制
+export { setMaxConcurrency, getMaxConcurrency } from "./utils/concurrency";
+
+// 导出 Hook 版本的工具
+export {
+  useScrollManager,
+  type ScrollState,
+  type ScrollManagerOptions,
+  type UseScrollManagerReturn,
+} from "./hooks/useScrollManager";
+
+export {
+  useMemoryManager,
+  type ImageMemoryInfo,
+  type MemoryManagerOptions,
+  type UseMemoryManagerReturn,
+} from "./hooks/useMemoryManager";
+
+export {
+  useEnhancedMemoryManager,
+  type EnhancedImageMemoryInfo,
+  type MemoryHistoryPoint,
+  type MemoryLeakDetection,
+  type AutoCleanupStrategy,
+  type EnhancedMemoryManagerOptions,
+  type UseEnhancedMemoryManagerReturn,
+} from "./hooks/useEnhancedMemoryManager";
+
+export { useImageCache, type UseImageCacheReturn } from "./hooks/useImageCache";
+
+export {
+  useEnhancedImageCache,
+  type CacheOperation,
+  type CacheHitRateStats,
+  type CacheSizeDistribution,
+  type CacheCleanupHistory,
+  type IndexedDBStatus,
+  type CachePerformanceMetrics,
+  type SmartCacheStrategy,
+  type EnhancedImageCacheOptions,
+  type UseEnhancedImageCacheReturn,
+} from "./hooks/useEnhancedImageCache";
+
+export {
+  useLQIPCache,
+  type LQIPCacheOptions,
+  type UseLQIPCacheReturn,
+} from "./hooks/useLQIPCache";
+
+// 导出 Worker 相关功能
+export {
+  getLQIPWorkerPool,
+  resetLQIPWorkerPool,
+  type LQIPTask,
+  type LQIPResult,
+  type LQIPError,
+  type WorkerPoolOptions,
+} from "./utils/lqipWorkerPool";
+
+export {
+  detectWorkerCapabilities,
+  getWorkerRecommendation,
+  getRecommendedWorkerConfig,
+  testWorkerFunctionality,
+  getWorkerStatusReport,
+  getWorkerPerformanceMonitor,
+  type WorkerCapabilities,
+  type WorkerRecommendation,
+} from "./utils/workerDetection";
+
+// 导出共享功能
+export { LazyImageErrorBoundary } from "./shared/components";
+
+export {
+  withRetry,
+  bustUrl,
+  requestIdleCallbackCompat,
+  getLQIPConcurrencyManager,
+} from "./shared/utils";
+
+export {
+  DEFAULT_CONFIG,
+  PRIORITY_LEVELS,
+  LOADING_STATES,
+  LQIP_FORMATS,
+} from "./shared/constants";
+
+// Hooks
+export { useEnhancedInView } from "./hooks/useEnhancedInView";
+
+export {
+  useImageDecode,
+  type UseImageDecodeOptions,
+  type UseImageDecodeResult,
+} from "./hooks/useImageDecode";
+
+// 监控组件
+export { MemoryCacheMonitor, type MemoryCacheMonitorProps } from "./monitoring";

commits.name: Commit-0
